com.esotericsoftware.tablelayout
Class BaseTableLayout<C,T extends C,L extends BaseTableLayout,K extends Toolkit<C,T,L>>

java.lang.Object
  com.esotericsoftware.tablelayout.BaseTableLayout<C,T,L,K>

public abstract class BaseTableLayout<C,T extends C,L extends BaseTableLayout,K extends Toolkit<C,T,L>>
extends Object

Base layout functionality.

Author:
Nathan Sweet

Constructor Detail

BaseTableLayout

public BaseTableLayout(K toolkit)
Method Detail

invalidate

public void invalidate()
Invalidates the layout. The cached min and pref sizes are recalculated the next time layout is done or the min or pref sizes are accessed.

invalidateHierarchy

public abstract void invalidateHierarchy()
Invalidates the layout of this table and every parent widget.

add

public Cell<C> add(C widget)
Adds a new cell to the table with the specified widget.

row

public Cell row()
Indicates that subsequent cells should be added to a new row and returns the cell values that will be used as the defaults for all cells in the new row.

columnDefaults

public Cell columnDefaults(int column)
Gets the cell values that will be used as the defaults for all cells in the specified column. Columns are indexed starting at 0.

reset

public void reset()
Removes all widgets and cells from the table (same as clear()) and additionally resets all table properties and cell, column, and row defaults.

clear

public void clear()
Removes all widgets and cells from the table.

getCell

public Cell getCell(C widget)
Returns the cell for the specified widget in this table, or null.

getCells

Returns the cells for this table.

align

public L align(int align)
Alignment of the logical table within the table widget. Set to CENTER, TOP, BOTTOM , LEFT, RIGHT, or any combination of those.

center

public L center()
Sets the alignment of the logical table within the table widget to CENTER. This clears any other alignment.

top

public L top()
Adds TOP and clears BOTTOM for the alignment of the logical table within the table widget.

left

public L left()
Adds LEFT and clears RIGHT for the alignment of the logical table within the table widget.

bottom

public L bottom()
Adds BOTTOM and clears TOP for the alignment of the logical table within the table widget.

right

public L right()
Adds RIGHT and clears LEFT for the alignment of the logical table within the table widget.

public L debug()
Turns on all debug lines.

Turns on table debug lines.

layout

public void layout(float layoutX,
                   float layoutY,
                   float layoutWidth,
                   float layoutHeight)
Positions and sizes children of the table using the cell associated with each child. The values given are the position within the parent and size of the table.
